name: Shooting Star (itch)
description:
Stay focused!

Important point !

➡ 6 infinite levels!
➡ Test your SLRs!
➡ player control with joystick!
➡ Addictive!



Test your SLRs! In Shooting Star you have to go as far as possible. But beware ! A great agility will be required! Just try to avoid all the obstacles to go as far as possible! Use the arrow to move up or down and the spacebar to explode the blue blocks.
6 levels require more and more concentration and reflex are available.

You will be able to reach the biggest score. But at what level?
